introduction.title: Applicability Display
introduction.description: A powerful tool for showing the applicability of data modules or sets of data modules.

rule.description: Determine how the applicability of a data module or set of data modules should be displayed.
Determine how the applicability of a data module or set of data modules should be displayed based on conditions.

option.description: Font size, color, and style can be used to highlight important information or make the display more visually appealing.
Data items can be displayed in tables or lists to make it easier to compare and contrast different values.

practice.name: Keep it Simple
practice.description: Avoid using complicated or confusing language in the display rule.

practice.name: Use Clear and Concise Formatting
practice.description: Use tables, lists, and other formatting options to make the display easy to read and understand.

practice.name: Test Thoroughly
practice.description: Test the display rule with different inputs and conditions to ensure that it is working correctly.

attribute.name: Product
attribute.description: A characteristic of the product that can be used to determine its applicability.

attribute.name: Model
attribute.description: A specific type of product that can be used to determine its applicability.

attribute.name: Size
attribute.description: A physical characteristic of the product that can be used to determine its applicability.

condition.description: A statement that specifies when a particular data item or set of data items is applicable.
A statement that specifies when a particular data item or set of data items is applicable based on multiple conditions.

conclusion.summary: Applicability display is a powerful tool for showing the applicability of data modules or sets of data modules.

keyTakeaways.takeaway: Use simple and conditional display rules
